snippet: Members of the Young Conservatives of Texas planned to wander the campus Wednesday wearing signs that say, “Illegal immigrant,” and students who captured them were to get $25 gift certificates.
lead_paragraph: Members of the Young Conservatives of Texas planned to wander the campus Wednesday wearing signs that say, “Illegal immigrant,” and students who captured them were to get $25 gift certificates.

headline.main: Texas: Conservative Student Group Draws Fire for Immigration Game
headline.print_headline: Texas: Conservative Student Group Draws Fire For Immigration Game
